Our meeting yesterday was interesting especially in the evening the Spirit of God settled upon us like the dew upon the mown grass, and our hearts were made joyful in God. We feel the need of being fully prepared and 


                                   -227- 

fitted to stand in the battle in the day of the Lord.--Letter 1, 1851, p. 1. (To Brother and Sister Preston, October 19, 1851.
